name: Line Jump Run X: Robot Dash - by Cobalt Play 8 bit Games
name_original: Line Jump Run X: Robot Dash - by Cobalt Play 8 bit Games
description:
Line Jump Run X : Robot Dash - one of the best retro style games is now on iOS. Get back to that old school console gaming feel of the 80's like with the genesis, nintendo and atari consoles, and relive the golden years of classic gaming. Brought to you by the Cobalt Play 8 Bit Games team.

This is a running side scroller style game. Player who love classic games like mario and sonic will have a lot of fun.

FEATURES
★ GREAT CLASSIC CONSOLE STYLE GRAPHICS
★ SUPER SIMPLE TO PLAY YET HARD TO MASTER
★ MULTIPLE GAME ZONES TO RUN THROUGH
★ HUGE FUN FOR ADULTS AND KIDS
★ FREE TO DOWNLOAD


HOW TO PLAY
So so easy to play. Just tap the top half of the screen to jump and the bottom half of the screen to duck. Run for a long as possible and avoid the green blocks.


Please show your support by downloading Line Jump Run X : Robot Dash and rating the game.

Have fun :)
The Cobalt Play 8 Bit Games team
